lead_paragraph: On the day of his first speech to Congress, a new president rips up the script and opens the door to an unexpected compromise on immigration policy.

byline.original: By PETER BAKER and MAGGIE HABERMAN

headline.main: Ever a Showman, Donald Trump Keeps Washington Guessing
headline.print_headline: President Rips Up the Script, Then Sticks to the Teleprompter

snippet: On the day of his first speech to Congress, a new president rips up the script and opens the door to an unexpected compromise on immigration policy....
